esteem.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a feeling of respect for someone, or a good opinion of someone
esteem.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The critics held him in high esteem as an actor.
Please accept the small gift we enclose as a mark of our esteem.
my father’s complete lack of esteem for actors
esteem.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to respect and admire someone or something
esteem.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Peden was greatly esteemed by the people of Ayrshire.
He was esteemed as a literary wit.
